name: Don't Forget Me (dashteamgames, Alklord)
description:
We are linked to the things we touch in life...

keep the memory of an old woman alive.
"Don't forget" Me is game where you will dive into a heartwarming tale.

- PLEASE READ CONTROLS - 

Use W A S  D to move, L to fully skip dialogs and interact with objects, and keep K pressed to lift objects.
Leave the correct objects in her path to let her see them.
